alert.note: Alert for Chippewa; Kandiyohi; Renville (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 06 at 6:02PM CDT until May 06 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Tornado Warning for... East central Chippewa County in west central Minnesota... Southwestern Kandiyohi County in central Minnesota... Northwestern Renville County in central Minnesota... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 601 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Sacred Heart, or 21 miles east of Montevideo, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Clara City around 610 PM CDT. Prinsburg around 615 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this tornadic thunderstorm include Raymond. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
